attributes.action: to urge the faroe islands & denmark to ban the killing of pilot whales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The killing of these pilot whales is cruel & inhumane and the british goverment & E U should look into this cruel practice,and ask for it to be stopped the Faroe islanders can no longer claim that it is the only food source available.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to urge the faroe islands & denmark to ban the killing of pilot whales."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22226


Prime Minister's Office
